Name: RetroBound
About the game: The four heroes of legend have been sent to defeat the evil vampire lord, Vexx. He has brainwashed everyone and unleashed monsters upon the land. You must find the Time Crystal and restore RetroBound! A dark and unique RPG that brings back nostalgia while incorporating modern slang! Can you discover all the Easter Eggs in RetroBound?
Meta Title: RetroBound: Sep 11, 2020, Michael Halloran and Full Overview
